roleset.name: taking hold of, obtaining

example.name: Light Verb
example.text: Meaning that its economy and military are both 10 times stronger than everyone else s - no I do n't , as I 've pointed out in my previous post , there 'll China will inevitably want to become the regional power of Asia , it-1 'll want *PRO*-1 to do some land - grabbing of its own -LRB- Taiwan for example -RRB- which will lead to its demise .
example.arg: which will lead to its demise

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, grab.01. Corresponds to VNcls steal-10.5-1, obtain-13.5.2, hold-15.1-1.
